name: House Of Insanity
description:
House Of Insanity is a beginner project made in a digital arts class. This is my first game and I took a lot of inspiration from other bitsy games and used programs like pixsy. Thought I would upload it to itch just for fun and an easy link for my friends to play.

House Of Insanity involves the player traversing through a haunted house and as they go farther, the more insane they become. About a 5-10 minute playtime.
